subject: Rachel Alexandra (Race Horse)
Horses
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The showdown between the undefeated mare Zenyatta and Rachel Alexandra, the unbeaten 2009 Horse of the Year, is once more on at Oaklawn Park in Arkansas.
snippet: The showdown between the undefeated mare Zenyatta and Rachel Alexandra, the unbeaten 2009 Horse of the Year, is once more on at Oaklawn Park in Arkansas.
